articles.author: Brian Fung
articles.title: Asian Americans are anxious about hate crimes. TikTok ban rhetoric isn't helping - CNN
articles.description: Ellen Min doesn't go to the grocery store anymore. She avoids bars and going out to eat with her friends; festivals and community events are out, too. This year, she opted not to take her kids to the local St. Patrick's Day parade.

articles.content:
